title: My Avatar
content:
So here it is. At least two people have wondered about my avatar. So here it is. Itâ€™s a monkey candle I picked up at a thrift store. The photos look gritty because it was shot with my pinhole lens on my digital camera, which requires that I shoot at ISO 3200 to get even the most basic of shots.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090623015821im_/http:/typophile.com/files/IMGP2383_4093.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090623015821im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Gangsta03_6049.jpg)
author: DanGayle

comments.content:
I thought it was a monkey. Great avatar, Dan. :-)

Sharon
